Lunarpine walked around the outside of the Ark picking up broken off 
pieces of the hull, they wouldn't hold for very long once reattatched 
but they'd only have to hold until they crossed the ocean. Ramulus 
was out gathering technology, Ratchet was working on a way to 
reassemble the ancient ship, and the others were gathering equipment 
for the journey. Maybe this plan had a slim chance after all.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She nodded and looked at him. "I understand beloved. Let's start 
> putting this poor old ship back together.  We'll need it if the 
preds 
> attack again." She looked at him again and kissed him on the cheek.
>  She smiled, turned and walked up the ramp to the entrance. She was 
> smiling from ear to ear.  She was happy, for the first time, truely 
> happy. And it was him that made her happy.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lunarpine pulled himself away, he didn't want to but he knew that 
> the 
> > rag tag group at the Ark was all that stood between them and 
> > oblivion. "We'd better get back to work, there's alot of work to 
be 
> > done on this scrapheep." (Besides with Yanosh gone we're all 
that's 
> > defending the Ark.)
> > 
> > He didn't want the moment to end but he'd rather it end that way 
> then 
> > end in the abyss.
> >
